{"images":[{"width":2304,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231226/2023122608115382027231.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231226/2023122608120328636428.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2304,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231226/2023122608120253967500.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"抄大佬去年的作业，快抄完了发现，这文案不大对劲啊🥲","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231221/2023122110104248981820.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"世2。最近好忙啊，就算抽空练会也有无数个人发消息，根本静不下来，快点结束吧…","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231218/2023121808064180452234.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231218/2023121808064083178446.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"世1。筋疲力竭，勉强写俩😵‍💫","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231217/2023121710381459452346.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231217/2023121710381436388067.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"嗣7。阴晴圆缺都休说，且喜人间好时节。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231216/2023121608392306862773.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231216/2023121608392259076673.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231216/2023121608392348565553.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"嗣6。请教老师为什么竹纸能“更练手上工夫”？我咋感觉鹿鸣这种摩擦小的纸更能把问题放大？😅","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231214/2023121406484259195382.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231214/202312140648440115792.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"嗣5。手感不好时，就少写一点吧！😎","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":2304,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231213/2023121305162091455095.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"嗣4。初体验，竹纸确实好用。也真的不适合练线条，这不得洇出大满贯😎不过诚心发问：这个纸和鹿鸣哪个更练手头工夫？感觉鹿鸣是不会包容任何瑕疵，体现的明明白白，这个纸写出来好看，但有些问题会被掩盖，只试了一天，也不知道感觉准不准。总结：旱的旱死，涝的涝死。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4095,"height":2304,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231212/2023121209063858529025.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4095,"height":2304,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231212/2023121209063915621993.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"嗣3。这个字越写越舒适，不过总是大了点。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4095,"height":2304,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231211/2023121108142344516568.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"嗣2。感觉自己写的是不是有点太慢了，大佬们写这个字一般多久？","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231210/2023121008050354294050.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231210/2023121008050192859849.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昔7嗣1纟22。物有甘苦，尝之者识；道有夷险，履之者知。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":2776,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231209/2023120911492706455306.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231209/2023120911492517282894.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231209/2023120911492442284993.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昔6纟21。有朋友说被“万”虐了，我提笔就准备给他报仇，结果亦被斩于马下…转折处侧锋太难处理了，就此作罢，告辞！[抱拳]","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231208/2023120809163363424327.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231208/2023120809164087361270.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231208/2023120809163824429766.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昔5。明朝即长路，惜取此时心。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231206/2023120608280803596525.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2417,"height":2417,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231206/2023120608270174149718.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2567,"height":2567,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231206/2023120608273319353102.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昔4。除了单字的难度外，把控字与字之间大小胖瘦高矮也很重要，下面还是成不了一条直线，继续加油吧。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":2304,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231205/2023120509035833736217.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231205/2023120509035051152988.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231205/2023120509035831166456.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昔3纟20。学书养气，亦可静心。最近工作太忙甚是疲惫，下班回家都想鸽一天，所幸提起了笔。第一个字写完感觉就来了，不纯粹是那种写字的手感，而是人突然静下来了，身体或许还有些疲惫，但内心如雪后初晴，顿扫阴霾之气，妙极了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231204/2023120408365114086121.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231204/2023120408365472730857.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昔2纟19。君子之所为，众人固不识也。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2304,"height":3759,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231203/2023120308291604477965.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231203/2023120308291655730914.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"在7昔1。为什么我看一本书，第一遍看完能记住的东西不到十之一二，还要去看第二遍，记忆力如此之差，你们也这样吗？😓","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2262,"height":3499,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231202/2023120202553232536159.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2304,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231202/2023120202553435842834.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2304,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231202/2023120202553546713162.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"在6纟18，我想练字就练字，想看书就看书，想睡觉就睡觉，每每思及此处，便顿觉来自灵魂深处的舒爽。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231201/2023120110230048432751.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231201/2023120110225361753489.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"在5纟17，不好，但没关系。😎","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231130/2023113008101765644364.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231130/2023113008101973840482.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"在4纟16。红叶黄花秋意晚，千里念行客。飞云过尽，归鸿无信，何处寄书得？\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231129/2023112907355442864138.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"在3纟15。只有纯粹的横与竖，却并不简单。没有花哨的笔画润色，线条问题十分凸显，这些问题与前面线条练习所存在的问题并不相同。单线的质感与整体的融合要相得益彰，像是很吃功力的一个字。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231128/202311280917408682451.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231128/2023112809193231533161.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231128/2023112809193392071272.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"在2纟14。写累了，刚好睡觉(¯o¯)💤","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231127/2023112707432904576783.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"在1纟13。晚上加练，重新打卡补齐消失的纟。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1200,"height":2670,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231126/2023112610313006846450.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"初7纟12。交友须带三分侠气，做人要存一点素心。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231125/2023112508560714359290.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231125/2023112508560599120592.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"初6纟11。学会用好摆烂心态，能让自己身心愉悦。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231124/2023112409300174173985.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"初5纟11。练字状态直观反应身体状态，罢了，今天就到这，睡觉！！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231123/2023112307285083378753.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"初4纟10。尘心洗尽兴难尽，一树蝉声片影斜。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231121/2023112107382262628263.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"初3纟9。哎嘿！这几个字今儿写的还挺爽。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231120/2023112008181616072332.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"初2纟8。一周不行，这个纟我要练一个月，势必拿捏你！！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231119/2023111903450338351460.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231119/2023111903450277140262.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"维7初1。换了个字，有种刑满释放的感觉😅前面的字不常复习也会退步[加油]","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231118/2023111808125739355477.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"维6。平心静气，不急不躁，方有所获。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231117/2023111709115708554312.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231117/2023111709115463933421.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"维5。好久没练，哈哈哈哈哈哈这横竖线条歪的呦。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231116/2023111608462817033141.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"维4。我醉歌时君和，醉倒须君扶我，惟酒可忘忧。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231115/2023111512402822887349.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"维3。加油加油加油加油加油","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3066,"height":4042,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231114/2023111409422192713141.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"维2。琢磨了一下结构，还没参透，不过比开始好一些了，明天继续研究。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2983,"height":3977,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231113/2023111309205005650091.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"国9维1。稳住心态，坚实前往。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231111/2023111107540419958114.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"国8。已经一周多了还是不满意，本来。想问问牛牛继续写国还是练其它字破题，结果今天不点评，冥冥之中让我要多苟一天。😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231110/2023111012135079832414.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"国7。一周了还是差很多意思，明天继续，让牛牛点评救赎一下☹️","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1652,"height":1238,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231105/2023110507333375976948.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4032,"height":3024,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231105/2023110507333483533711.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231105/2023110507333496432616.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"国3。这个国字越写越觉得有颜楷的气概，总给我一种宽博稳重之感，可能是因为外框有向外拱的趋势？最后三个字索性放大了这个特点，竟意外诞生MVP。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231103/2023110306222058075078.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231103/2023110306222080416198.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231103/2023110306222070480231.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"帝2。意识跑在手法前，脑子想到了，手办不到😂控笔要继续加强。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1938,"height":2584,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231010/2023101008025180348747.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231010/2023101008030390764064.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1046,"height":1035,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231010/2023101008062724412285.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"皇3。不对劲，总感觉结构不对劲，又发现不了在哪，是下面的“王”纵向有些长了吗？（打完这些字去不厌搜“皇”字才发现，果然电子版更清晰一些，甚至感觉很打印的存在一些字型差距…有必要对着电子版精临3天抠细节，后面单字就是2+3+2临摹模式了：2天临帖熟练某个字，3天电子版精临记住细节，再2天返回帖子看整体）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3377,"height":2532,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230921/2023092107354499864095.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230921/2023092107355218379310.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昨晚偶尔写出几个相对可以的圈，书写时感受到了一股力，行笔时隐隐有万岁枯藤的感觉，岂料写完一看总的形体，这个圈又给我一种温润如玉的气质，真是神奇啊。书法中的阴阳无处不在，就算是简单的线条，松与紧、开与阖、筋与形、冲与接，乃至过程与结果、手感与视觉，种种囊括万殊，裁成一相，如能品味一二，何尝不是一种天趣呢。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230826/2023082610112911119177.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2172,"height":1808,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230826/2023082610112865981336.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2344,"height":1758,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230826/2023082610112909494285.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"“尽日寻春不见春，芒鞋踏遍陇头云。归来笑拈梅花嗅，春在枝头已十分。”道不远人，何必道在迩而求诸远，做好当下。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230825/202308250807460446808.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4032,"height":3024,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230825/2023082508074602732187.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230825/2023082508074614775733.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"拟歌先敛，欲笑还颦，最断人肠。拟左先右，欲上还下，方成笔势。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1498,"height":2627,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230821/2023082108150555976323.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1196,"height":2203,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230821/2023082108155448041057.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2360,"height":1274,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230821/2023082108160672653462.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"灵雨霏霏，乍起乍歇；山头烟合，忽掩青螺；树杪云蒸，顷迷翠黛。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230815/2023081508143237931663.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230815/2023081508143294518961.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"诚者，天之道也、思诚者，人之道也。至诚而不动者，未之有也、不诚，未有能动者也。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2429,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230814/2023081408131843346519.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2461,"height":3934,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230814/2023081408131902886275.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3698,"height":2022,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230814/2023081408131765552734.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"星佬用鹌鹑蛋和筷子做比喻简直太妙了。我发力的救赎之道就在其中。多一分力少一分力都夹不起，心神往那一照，手是自然做出反应的，大脑甚至没思考用几分力。\n\n尝试复盘这种自然发力的来源并应用在练线条上：一是大量重复，经验形成的肌肉反应（发力的度）。源自从小对自己发力程度和筷子的了解，中VS外，老手VS小白。二是紧张的消除，正常人用筷子时只会心神一动，我要夹了，不会去想夹不起来怎么办。初练线条可能心有执念：","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1815,"height":3490,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230813/2023081309295170668852.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2093,"height":3888,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230813/202308130929520072493.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"不深思则不能造于道，不深思而得者，其得易失。然而学者有无思虑而得者，何也？曰：以无思无虑而得者，乃所以深思而得之也。以无思无虑为不思而自以为得者，未之有也。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2182,"height":3879,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230812/2023081210072646712112.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2266,"height":4029,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230812/2023081210072681861189.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2076,"height":1504,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230812/2023081210072587761874.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"关于这个精神状态😂自然就好？昨晚尝试再去放松，就感觉把握不住了，线条会自然变歪，再去修正反而要费更大的劲，今上午“紧张”了一下，反而感觉紧的刚刚好，给我整懵了朋友们😮","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230811/2023081107542058272168.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230811/2023081107542124446284.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【精神上放松不要憋气】太过于努力紧张，容易憋着气行笔，手放松点，自然呼吸。行笔过程中手部用力的松与紧顺其自然即可。精神上的紧张容易引起手部不自觉的强行让笔毫无时无刻处于绷紧的状态，这样会降低线条质量，同时也难入静，还会很累。所以要以一种闲庭散步的姿态去行笔。毛笔保持住弹性，也不是一直让它绷紧到最强限度，它的弹性其实也有一个微小的区间，呼应书者的放松状态下的自然呼吸，毛笔其实也是有一个呼吸感，它不是","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2584,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230810/2023081008022153192822.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2823,"height":4029,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230810/2023081008022031445973.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4030,"height":1971,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230810/2023081008022084541399.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"昨晚注意了弯腰和低头的问题，果然比今早要好一些。练竖起笔离身体比较远，胳膊的稳定性刚练时不高，为了稳住起笔总会不自觉弯腰过度，这几天慢慢改正。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230809/2023080908125608815109.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2461,"height":3881,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230809/2023080908125352221726.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3935,"height":1907,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230809/2023080908125512621455.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"那种自然而然的宛若内劲般的结实还是不够还是不够还是不够，加油！！！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2482,"height":3928,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230808/2023080810471341799142.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2945,"height":3917,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230808/2023080810471401774237.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4030,"height":2483,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230808/2023080810471349428381.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"虽有天下易生之物也，一日暴之，十日寒之，未有能生者也。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230807/2023080707394953834114.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"右二笔没舔净，墨过多，感受不到笔的弹力和摩擦，脚下没根容易按的过重，软绵绵滴，以后避雷了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230806/2023080607340034551004.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4030,"height":2970,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230806/2023080607340062359968.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"几天没写横，今天起笔就想写细，反倒得到一根羸弱的线条。还是踏踏实实练内功，控笔自然而然就会更好。写细也是一种果。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230805/2023080506294954812136.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"强提一口气写，无力，感冒快好😩","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230804/2023080408185283894881.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230804/2023080408185202453805.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"凡操千曲而后晓声，观千剑而后识器。故圆照之象，务先博观。这几天大抵是有些改善的。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2932,"height":3910,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230803/2023080308121876275463.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2940,"height":3866,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230803/2023080308121869738189.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"凡世之所贵，必贵其难。真书难于飘扬，草书难于严重，大字难于结密而无间，小字难于宽绰而有余。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3022,"height":3681,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230802/2023080208095694395871.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":3770,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230802/202308020809564657943.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":3958,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230802/2023080208095782978212.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"有我之境，以我观物，故物我皆着我之色彩。无我之境，以物观物，故不知何者为我，何者为物。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":959,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230517/2023051707571304782304.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230517/202305170757253759199.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230517/2023051707572545146660.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY82-昨天请教了劳斯，得到了一些解答，分享内容给新来的纯萌新同学，不是什么心得，避坑而已，应该也不会有人出现这种离谱的问题吧？\n虽说执笔无定法，但是中指离食指别太远，否则手腕是不能放松的。我产生这种错误情况的原因大致有二：一是从拿笔那一刻起就没注意到这个问题，自然而然这样握了，好像小时候老师就是这样教的一般（印象中确实是这样）；二是桌子稍有点低，为了让手腕平一点别折起来，会向上执笔，手在笔的","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230516/2023051608083865555894.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY81-夜跑完了练功，练功完了睡觉，睡醒了继续练功，练完功练字，练字结束上班。对不起我的波棱盖。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230515/2023051507095132228172.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":907,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230515/2023051507095131380711.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY80-昨晚与今早，成功捕获一只洪水猛兽。80天了，横线再练一个月，欠下的迟早要还。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":959,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230514/2023051408395715627381.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY79-没什么想法，但渐入佳境，比昨天好，写细了一点。今天是个特别的日子，被爱的同时也别忘记爱她，朋友们何妨抽空给老母亲问声安。也祝群里的妈妈们节日快乐，希望你们永远年轻，永远热泪盈眶。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230513/2023051304084591371166.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY78-今天状态不太好同。好像都是些老问题，很长时间了，留在那但还没能力处理。倒也不急，日拱一卒慢慢练吧。😂不晓得算是看开还是正儿八经摆烂。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230512/2023051207570670511077.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY77-不徐不疾。从容点好，走的长远。话说同学们最近真的卷啊，推着人向前。但真正的卷王，从来不止一个身份。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":959,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230511/2023051107505563253992.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY76-恢复晨练，然后苦哈哈去上班。OS：笑笑笑笑笑什么笑别给我嘻嘻哈哈！！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1844,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230510/2023051007281082271637.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY75-耶！是自己相对满意的一天。偏美中不足今方信呀，我写得挺快乐，墨泅的也挺带劲，随它去。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1780,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230509/20230509081259833318.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY74-王氏老方，学习失败😟","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230508/2023050811084507224958.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230508/2023050811084473449548.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY73-试水失败，写的稀碎，今晚有时间就卷完昨天和今天剩下纸。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230507/2023050708212010417387.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY72-双手离桌再体验，难难难。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230506/2023050608523697829262.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY71-1.昨天没练，果然偷懒一时爽，一直偷懒一直爽，别学我，让我一个人爽；
2.好久没清晨写了，今天周六再尝试一下，真香；
3.身体别前倾太厉害对写直很有用，给右臂留出足够的空间活动；
4.中锋不用急慢慢写就行，盘它！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230504/2023050408175892142079.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1170,"height":2532,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230504/2023050408175663855416.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1170,"height":2532,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230504/2023050408175672588775.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY70-线条写的不咋好，想法却有不老少。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230503/2023050310114261532238.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY69-被谢师兄催了，匆匆写写，点名批评！！
2.冷静了，有点进步时也会冷静，没以前那种狂热的喜悦了，不知为何，不知好坏。
1.感悟明天再说吧，太长，来不及了。写横的时候想到了飞鸟，延展了一系列想法，不没静，但有收获，很具象的一些想法。
0.今天熬的有点晚了，朋友们早睡晚安。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230502/2023050207270250487601.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY68-此时情绪此时天，无事小神仙！！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230501/2023050109440502590576.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY67-下半场极致的松懈，松到脑子好像都不运行了，眼睛也聚不了焦，也不晓得从哪发的力，只有手，指尖稍微在感受纸的反馈，五感闭了四感…要么是找到放松状态了，要么是困了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2894,"height":3859,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230430/2023043010232506760251.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY66-松慢易得，唯静难守。刚好从五一开始停俩月硬笔，进行精准打击。对不起了老朋友☝🏻","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230429/2023042907365512034122.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1993,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230429/2023042907365513953797.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY65-1.基本能够保持中锋；
2.可以慢下来；
3.单根线条不行，先抖再歪且不匀称；
4.昨天看到有大佬重新返回画横线，感觉在多数人急着向上走时，能够选择让自已真正下沉的人，很厉害。
5.起笔洇墨对行笔的心理影响变小了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1706,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230428/2023042808050652315084.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230428/202304280805065339470.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY64-今天写的时候心态很稳。每天太充实了，感觉一天24个小时根本不够用呀，在从容不迫的忙碌找到的乐趣，才更让人舒适欢喜欢喜欢喜欢喜欢喜。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230427/2023042708133077559371.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230427/2023042708133083470563.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY63-从容不迫+坚持不懈！今天是划线条把纸划开的一天🫣","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230426/2023042608104879151542.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1217,"height":1722,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230426/202304260810487911325.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230426/2023042608104877583290.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY62-认真从容的对待每一根正在书写的线条，哪怕它因何不尽人意。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230425/2023042508073487451084.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230425/2023042508073473069356.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY61-今早看到秋杏同学说写完很累，想了想自己好久没这种感觉啦，一直在放松，反而怠惰了，真正的松不是精神飘忽，有时候是不是也得让自己纠结一点（东南隅要练就的匠心光芒哈哈哈哈哈哈），比如这个月的抠细节。文武之道，贵乎一张一驰。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230424/2023042407250481631379.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230424/2023042407250492275223.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY60-在第二个月结束，给跟我一样的小萌新大冤种的小建议：一定要尽早看完篆书课程所有视频，所有！！\n惭愧啊，俩月了，昨天才刷完一遍。之前看完峄山碑就没继续了，昨天看完所有，大受震撼，尤其是笔势部分，虽然是高阶知识现在用不到，但是会让你想明白一些困惑的问题，让你明白现在你做这些是为了什么，这才是真正能让人放松，让人静下心来练线条的法宝之一。\n当然也可能悟到一些切实可用的，比如我晓得了老师收笔为什","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230423/2023042307521441954023.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230423/2023042307521443267348.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY59-沾染不好的习气改起来太难了😭几乎要从头再来一遍，硬笔已经重新开始了……以此观之软笔更要把基础打稳呀，否则就是南辕北辙的道理，横线马上要奔向第三个月了，奥利给！！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230422/2023042207321824490309.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230422/2023042207321823419894.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY58-起笔的提是顺势行为，不要刻意。打一拳，蓄力不是目的是手段。蓄力过猛反而出拳没劲。\n软笔按部就班继续训练，硬笔墨迹版一年后再见👋黑色56789月要来了呀。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230421/2023042108080938147597.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230421/2023042108081506727009.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY57-你随便洇，我根本不在乎😎😎😎","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230420/2023042007330044278283.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230420/2023042007330043425814.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY56-一事有恒，万事渐振，加油！！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230419/2023041908114991382112.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230419/2023041908115014643827.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230419/2023041908114988171987.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY55-久久不能平静，但不嗔不燥，通透感极强的一大早。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1396,"height":1861,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230418/2023041808082966857788.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY54-写完后想到了无力又大胆的解释：为啥起笔总洇墨，并且只洇前2cm后面没影响？大概是因为1.确实墨多了 2.手指按纸按的久了😂了（写前一根会用手指压住后一根的起笔位置）硬笔写完忘记拍了，明儿补上。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230417/2023041707493820846135.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":2013,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230417/2023041707493814988678.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY53-怎么说呢，慢是慢了，但总感觉有点太慢了，写一两根还行，通篇这么划拉会不会影响节奏啊。稳中求慢还是自然连贯，新问题来了。明天试试再自然点，还是得实践出结果，不断试错，不断排除，多是一件美逝。🥹","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230416/2023041608035163129864.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230416/2023041608035161187308.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY52-小小纸张不讲武德，中间搞偷袭。昨天老师指导每条慢点写，要2分钟以上，没好意思说自己2分钟根本写不完，让人老脸一红😂\n快俩月了，过两天开始抓细节，实在不行再适当减减量吧，稳点好。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230415/2023041512015261054050.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230415/2023041512015260479336.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY51-今天练习时格外的放松，不刻意、不纠结，没有很大力，只关注笔墨，这种状态很舒服，也很满意。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1228,"height":1638,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230414/2023041408154739415110.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1338,"height":1943,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230414/2023041408154732683757.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230414/2023041408154735056840.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY50-昨晚VS今早，写横线时的心情跃然纸上，反差很大，大抵能猜到哪个是心态狂躁的时候吧😎感觉慢松静中，静最难得。想要静，多睡觉💤","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1706,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230413/2023041307485458475475.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2015,"height":1313,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230413/2023041307485463175211.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY49-终于……手感觉到比前一日的中锋运用的更好。不得不再次感慨，起笔太太太重要了。\n以前偷懒，起笔笔杆是斜的没垂直，起完再掰直，导致行笔没力度且笔根会有点绞，写着写着就偏锋。\n总之，心要沉住气，线要起笔稳，明天开始新课题：观察前细后粗的问题。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230412/2023041208044304020961.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230412/20230412080443086730.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY48-习惯才是最大的进步。无事每天练，大有益意。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230411/2023041107470697883267.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230411/2023041107470703046890.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY47-突然发现三个月行程已经过半了呀，真快😴头一低就写歪，要继续矫正姿势。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230410/2023041008074015695916.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230410/2023041008074011175876.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY46-没有白走的路，每一步都算数。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230409/2023040908223306173464.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3832,"height":663,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230409/2023040908223301671552.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230409/2023040908223304318837.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY45-前一阵看到师兄师姐闹洇墨，终于也中招了，建议不要让墨隔夜，用多少倒多少就好，不要用隔夜墨兑水，更不要当天墨隔夜墨和水搅一起（总之我昨天是因为这个原因出现线条起笔洇墨，行笔一会又正常的情况，再就是我可能润笔时水没吸干净）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230408/2023040808242803160812.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230408/2023040808242805189401.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY44-细节还是没法看👀，1是手仍然抖，2是提按控制差很多，说到底手跟不上脑子了。（至少证明有脑子不是😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230407/2023040711391245371635.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230407/2023040711391242975379.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY43-想停想提按，但停不大明白😩明天继续感受。感谢星佬昨天的分享。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230406/2023040608043804775993.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230406/2023040608043806016283.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY42-线条太长把握不住，实在是写不完整张纸了，精疲力竭，小小横线有时候也挺耗心神的。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230405/2023040511591119566595.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230405/2023040511591341660309.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY40-起、行、收，各有各的难点，是时候分体系找问题去解决了。一站俩小时，确实要人老命，但今天总感觉自己练的时候莫名很自嗨，嗨到有时静不下心的那种……正常吗？（内心已经开始自己蹦迪了，满脑子都是朝仓行宣😂）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230404/2023040407562776573454.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230404/2023040407562777927166.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY40-是不是手臂最好打开，手肘最好稍稍提起呀？总感觉前者可以行气到手上，后者可以让大臂发力。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230403/2023040307251342523434.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230403/2023040307251349259773.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY39-感觉起笔的“提”是用来卸力的。起笔逆锋按下去后笔尖会给一个向上的反作用力，这个力处理不好笔尖就会弹出去，这应该也是自己刚开始练笔尖总是向上向下歪一下的原因。顺着这个力的方向，向上提一下，可以把这个力给化去，再顺势下压铺毫就会铺开。这个提是自然而然地卸力，是顺势而为并非刻意，是果而非因。\n传统功夫是讲究化劲的，四两拨千斤，传统书法也是，原来马老师早就看透了一切。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230402/2023040207340480796021.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1784,"height":1338,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230402/2023040207340485367180.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY28-昨天直播牛牛说要写慢，数量不必太多，重要的是质量，很有道理！！就是说嘛，怎么可能是周日怠惰，分明是听老师的话🤔🤔今天感觉不错，线条应该比以前好一些了吧#","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230401/2023040107355937639695.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230401/2023040107360053521476.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY37-写的很急躁，写到一半直接偷懒把间距放大，线条也不好，但就不跟自己较真了，毕竟是周六着急写完出去玩🤤，今日开摆，快乐无罪！！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230331/2023033107412260324132.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230331/2023033107412162113247.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY36-起收还得继续练啊，尤其收笔时，笔尖充分发挥主观能动性，就是不听手指挥，要么上大要么下大要么出尖，妙啊，但下次不必这么变化丰富的🤨硬笔遇到了几个想写（实则好写）的字，就很舒服。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230330/2023033008052995324012.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY35-今天的线条质量比昨天稍好了一点，下一课题《线条之前的布白均匀》。\n感觉自己起笔真的像马老师的接化发，逆锋按（接）-提（化）-再按走（发）一气呵成，嗷，很快啊！线就开始歪了😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2569,"height":3425,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230329/2023032907310772737009.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230329/2023032907310776596741.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY34-手感进入恢复期，第二个月果然能发现的问题比第一个月变多。第一个月练，第二个月要练中带想了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230328/202303280937341559481.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230328/2023032809373399693877.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230328/2023032809373197480771.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY33-来来回回反反复复嘻嘻哈哈。昨晚练了会起收笔，效果甚微。\n病情不太稳定，建议加大剂量。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230327/2023032708100804214319.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230327/2023032708100869365532.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230327/2023032708100711516936.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY32-起收笔太差劲，明天不练线条了，搞专项练习。😮‍💨","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1170,"height":2532,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230326/2023032609065491578593.png","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY5 补上补上 每次都缺一天强迫症很难受…","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230326/2023032611461980568520.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230326/2023032611462241431778.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY31-开启第二个月。日退一步，早晚返璞归真😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230325/2023032512104011367469.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230325/2023032512103748660534.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY30-正式一个月了。
昨天：明天会更好😎😎
今天：大家不要信，昨天乱讲的🤪🤪
上午跑了个半马，硬笔把昨天欠的那半页写完后实在没有力气写新一页了，下午看状态要不要补上今天的，又是一个酣畅淋漓的周六！！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230324/2023032408053517625508.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230324/202303240805358813570.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY29-没有很好，但比昨天好，明天会更好。🤤🤤","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230323/2023032308134166782205.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2690,"height":3473,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230323/2023032308134124781542.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230323/2023032308134267954016.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY28-如何知道自己练的钱问题有多大？间距缩小，计白当黑。我看到之前老师给一个闯关同学的建议是线条写的密一点，试了一下果然间距大会隐藏一些问题，而间距越小，问题显现的越明显。你要看自己写的怎么样，就不能只看写的线条，还要看间距形成的第二个“线条”，恍然大悟，嘿，这不就是计白当黑嘛！最后写燥了，匆匆了事。基础不稳，地动山摇，明天开始速度减慢，只写一张，慢慢品。\r\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230322/2023032207345835779752.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230322/2023032207345936051490.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230322/2023032207345895289035.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY27-收笔总是歪就很离谱，尝试了很多角度还是不行，又很难接受收笔的时候笔尖描一下，大佬们有什么秘诀吗？哈哈哈哈美好的一天要从自己的骂骂咧咧中开始了！！快要一个月了，线条还是很不稳。啥时候手才能不抖？🤪","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230320/2023032008052581760250.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230320/2023032008052680558023.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230320/2023032008052669652646.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY26-前几天学到了一些东西，今天开始就原地踏步了，这是要我好好消化一下？不过硬笔好似堪堪有所进益，多想互通有无，慢慢练吧。发现练拉线条以来难以避免的魔咒：最后两条必写歪。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230319/2023031912333675559694.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230319/20230319123336375993.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1575,"height":2100,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230319/2023031912332742016700.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY25-昨晚又看了一遍老师的视频，有点感悟就起来写了一张（图一），标出了三根有问题的线，今天上午写的虽然整体看起来不如昨晚的，但我个人感觉其实是比昨晚好一点的，最后给问题来个特写，产生的根本原因是起笔，有时候会产生一种“伪中锋”的用笔，看起来笔尖在中间，但笔根因为起笔略有绞转，其实是偏的，写着写着就会出现一小段接近偏锋的状态。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230318/2023031807563920485596.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230318/2023031807563926549005.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230318/2023031807562286220369.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY-果然还是很难忍受原先的墨，老老实实在那吃灰吧，什么浪费不浪费的😂又是个好周六。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230317/2023031708054010160934.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230317/202303170805401257507.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230317/2023031708054038699668.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY23-二十多天了才发现，在影响一根线条好坏的因素中，起笔的质量要占50%以上，所以一定要仔细慢慢写。同时铺毫状态还会影响到收笔质量，起势之道，不可不察啊。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4032,"height":3024,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230315/2023031509294073055784.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230315/2023031509293951750081.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230315/2023031509293900081653.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY22-昨天太困写完10根直接睡了没打卡可还行？😂今晚想了想以前买的墨虽然胶重了极难用，但总不能浪费了，趁现在水平不够，先把辣鸡墨用完吧，果然不出所料，这纸皱的呀。反正给各位踩个雷，非必要别用六品堂的墨…唉，硬笔最近也遇到瓶颈了，止步不前若干天，甚至有隐隐倒退之势，也挺愁人的😮‍💨灵飞经乱我道心啊。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230313/2023031309520918975490.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230313/2023031309520571417158.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230313/2023031309520637916756.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY21-写着写着就歪了😂收笔好难，总是会有个尖尖","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230312/2023031207020504620075.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230312/2023031207020342279022.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230312/2023031207020396440129.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY20-昨天直播老师说我之前写的太细了，线条不易惯力，今天开始尝试写粗一点，还不是很习惯，比较难把握线与线的粗细一致，但是写起来确实会感觉更有力了。\n还有就是提醒大家，笔不用吃墨太饱，镇纸也不用太重，更别相信大力出奇迹，否则，如你所见，自己和纸都尴尬🫢🥹","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230311/202303110114287656740.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230311/2023031101143206426559.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230311/2023031101143202323996.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY19-感觉手开始抖的变慢了，真是个好苗头。下一步开始尝试解决起笔收笔的问题了🥹周六三件事，练字加班吃酒。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230310/202303100911211665188.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230310/2023031009112083381331.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230310/2023031009112110685252.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY18-学生突然发热送去就医…练完毛笔硬笔匆匆写了一半，昨儿也是，刚画一根线条就…😂溜了溜了，明天补上。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230308/2023030810010491189308.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230308/202303081001027977502.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230308/2023030810010571522861.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY17-今天还是不好，但在越来越好。\n发现练字的时候需要一个安静的环境，对，就是纯音乐都不能放的那种，这样集中精力线条真的会变直，明天开始戒一段时间练字听书的习惯🧐","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230307/2023030708072038849949.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230307/2023030708072197656550.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230307/202303070807239959896.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY16-今儿一塌糊涂，罢了罢了，明儿再找新感觉喽。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230305/2023030508412582459124.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230305/2023030508412764882565.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230305/2023030508412136586110.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY14-磨刀不误砍柴工，周日浪完再练功。🫡","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230304/2023030401555477956140.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230304/2023030401555606787069.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230304/2023030401555764379716.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"得DAY13-今天就写到这吧，天气太好了，得出去耍耍🤤美好的周六有了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230303/2023030308021557034071.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230303/2023030308021575624459.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230303/2023030308021239943413.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY12-行笔的摩擦力偶尔可以感受到了，提按依旧很难掌控，线条拉到后面会斜且变粗，可能是肩膀没打开的原因？明天上午打开写试试。今天晚上没事就很开心了，一会去肝硬笔打发时间了🥹","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230302/2023030208492998715879.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230302/2023030208493488536335.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230302/2023030208493391035658.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY11-今天的收获是，虽然线条进步很小，仍然不直无力，但线与线之间比以前好很多了，大致的方向也稍有改进，没那么斜了。\n诚心提问，大家平时写多长的线条？后半部分因为手肘运行产生弧度而变向怎么呀？感谢！！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230301/2023030109493643542031.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230301/2023030109494034598965.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230301/2023030109493891663629.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY10-累了累了，写完睡觉。平时都是早晨写写硬笔，今早甚乏没写，晚上补了一下，害！果然没搞定，明早提前起一会继续补吧，加油！！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230228/2023022811042515688833.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230228/2023022811042605112495.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY9-无事，遂与友人小酌，归来已至睡时，反复不能寐，起又夜书一小时，酒正酣，手弱身乏，线不成形。愈写愈燥，强压心猿，至书毕，又觉酣畅，欣然若所悟。\n今日书语：养成习惯，毋须多时；置身其间，是常乐境；莫问得失，且行且乐。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230227/2023022708030537972555.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230227/2023022708030926570458.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230227/2023022708031109427107.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY8-坚持就是胜利✌️给自己立了个线条只拉100天看看能到什么程度的小实验玩玩，但愿4个月内能完成吧🤡🤡如果完不成…","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230226/2023022610041014243362.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230226/2023022610041013217317.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230226/2023022610041015249318.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY7-画线条一周了，抖抖擞擞，不慌不慌，就是慢慢练。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230224/2023022408090353488272.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230224/2023022408090357186817.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230224/2023022408090361466233.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY6/今天手感觉比昨天稳了！开始慢慢不注意效果了，而是感受写字带来的静和快感了，真正想要的原来是这个，一手好字只是自然而然，坚持下去的馈赠而已，差点本末倒置了。希望明天还是保持这种心态。\n今日书语：由它好坏，随喜观之。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230223/2023022308161589260414.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230223/2023022308161268278872.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3024,"height":4032,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230223/2023022308161595054851.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY6/第六天依旧菜，继续向大佬们学习，今儿悟到了点什么东西，但不多哈哈哈哈。\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230222/2023022209135239282771.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230222/2023022209135362594363.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230222/2023022209135393181473.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY4/DAY5。昨天加班，匆匆写完没打卡，今天补上，也不分哪天哪天了。多少感觉自己有点大病……今天写着写着手会突然一抖，不晓得是不是昨晚熬大夜的原因，明天再写写试试😵\n今日书语：丑没关系，别太粗，别太粗，别太粗，同时感觉提和按，不能只靠笔的支撑，手要同时使用上下两种力。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230220/20230220102727070592.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230220/2023022010272712025465.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY-3，手依旧抖，今天发现的问题有两个，一个是关于线条粗细的控制，觉得三分笔肯定是不行的，开局效果应该会好一些，进步效果怕是奇缓（纯个人猜测），所以线条还是要尝试稍微细点，以练提按协调；二是长线条身体角度，总会不自觉通过转身体去画线条，而不是通过肩肘，以后要注意肩膀打开，线条从左到右肩肘开合而非腰部转动。另外要么是真的写的奇差，要么是拍照可以放大问题，以后要多用手机拍警示自己。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230219/2023021910060184926006.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230219/2023021910060188265426.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230219/2023021910060197710554.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY2-练线条时站的有点累，觉得不该这样，手都抖成筛子了，总不能让腿也抖个不停，何不隔三差五跑跑。\n软硬兼施，身心同修，自今日始。\n今日书语：提按之道，难在提笔；急缓之法，贵乎缓行。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230218/2023021808232168575732.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230218/2023021808232174924124.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1707,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230218/2023021808232287699770.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"DAY1。开始了，可一定要坚持住啊，第一天练长线条，果然感觉肘肩两关节跟生锈的机器一样，不是很灵敏。","hasMore":false}
